name: Aston Machan (umamusume)
description:
LoRA of Aston Machan (umamusume)

All of my works is free. If you'd like to support me, feel free to buy me a coffee. 👍

Recommend options

  • LoRA weight 0.7~0.9

  • Trigger words

    • base

      • aston machan \(umamusume\)

    • Racing competition clothes :

      • red jacket, white shirt, collared shirt, black bowtie, long sleeves, straps between breasts, skirt, white dress, brown thighhighs, white loafer

      • (optional) holding doll, character doll, red hat crown

    • Casual clothes :

      • long sleeves, white shirt, frills, green skirt, button, black thighhighs, suspender

      • (optional) espectacled, red-framed eyewear

    • Tracen school uniform :

      • white thighhighs, tracen school uniform, purple shirt, pleated skirt, puffy short sleeves, white skirt, puffy sleeves, summer uniform, frilled skirt, sailor collar, sailor shirt, miniskirt, frills

Use animefull based model

  • Settings

    • Stable Diffusion WebUI by Automatic1111

    • DPM++ Series(SDE Karras, 2M Karras, etc.)

    • about 20 steps, CFG scale 3.5~6.5

    • kl-f8-anime2.vae

    • CLIP skip = 1

    • Use highres. fix to get higher quality image

      • Upscaler : Latent series

      • Denoising strength 0.50~0.65

LoRA training info

  • trained on sd-scripts by kohya_ss. Thank you a lot!

  • based on Animefull-pruned

  • 92 images of aston machan

    • 4x low quality 28 images

    • 8x medium quality 32 images

    • 16x high quality 32 images

    • => 1 epoch = 880 images

  • replaced character feature tags with aston machan \(umamusume\)

    • horse girl, horse tail, brown hair, blue eyes, etc.

  • resolution : 768x768

  • rank=alpha=16

  • batch size = 4, 8 epochs trained

  • other settings included in training_data.zip

This LoRA may be compatible with animefull-based models (ex. AbyssOrangeMix Series...)

All uploaded images are generated by AOM3A1
